monogr.title: Bulletin of the Ekaterinburg Theological Seminary

biblStruct.note: This article presents a russian translation of the ancient greek text of a sermon on the Feast of Encaenia at Jerusalem (Oratio de sancto sepulcro habita Hierosolymis), which is a part of the corpus of the so-called “greek Ephrem”. The translation is preceded by a discussion of the possible place where the sermon was delivered and its dating and authorship, special attention being paid at the S. heid’s hypothesis that attributes the sermon to St. Ephrem the Syrian. key textual variants are supplied and analyzed in the footnotes.
